Putting Yourself Out There

Blog Logo

David Fox

on 21 Nov 2016
read

As long as I’ve been a software developer, I’ve yet to really put myself out there and create a personal website. That’s pretty rare, and some would say unacceptable for people in my line of work. So in an effort to grow a little and get over some of my hesitancy, I’ve decided to put up this site.
